title: Voidstorm Asylum
description: The rails return to the origins of its origin with the power of this void, to which it will destroy the mysterious connection between the ghost of lightning and the mysterious masters of the Narrow Maze. And only the reckoning can reconcile the anger of Raisor.

title: Claszian Apostasy
description: Previously, Dark terror was a faithful follower of Claess, but the opportunity to steal a fraction of the boundless divine power forced him to betray his faith and violate all vows. However, a new connection with Klass has opened up the monstrous gates, and now the faceless usurper must seek the victims in order to satisfy the endless famine of its former master ... otherwise this destructive force will devour the Dark terror himself.

title: Set Dread Retribution
description: Through the eyes of the insane mask, Truxex flashed at the forgotten memories of her youth. But in addition to the nightmares, which the archer did not allow herself to think about, the mask revealed and much more - horrors seen by different eyes at other times. The memory of the cruelty stretching through the countless years, mysteriously filled with bloodlust every corner of the subconscious of Traksex. And even by removing the mask, she fights to overcome the impulses of self-destruction released by the evil scorched behind her eyes. In this whirlpool of hatred, its only salvation is revenge... Revenge for any worthy sacrifice met on the way.

title: Phantom Advent Set
description: The numerous manifestations of Mercury are no longer fragments of a single entity. One of them stole from many, and now a new face of the Spectra rises from it. By deception, a prisoner in the damn armor, the alienated shadow of Mercury noticed: with each soul taken in the name of this spoiled armor, she was increasingly aware of herself. First, the forced division led Mercury into an infuriated, but now she is looking for this atrocious freedom... and it kills as long as it takes.

title: Compass of the Rising Gale
description: The lirals and her foster family have always been a mystery of the birth of a whistle. But the older she got, the stronger her innermost connection to the wind, the more the Lirals were disturbed by the thoughts of her origin. Hoping to escape from the painful Dumas, she only doomed herself to know the bitter truth: that on the night of righteous reclamation, her village and blood relatives were destroyed by the elemental wind and that without this catastrophe, the Liral would not have become one of them.

title: The Eminence of Ristul
description: Satisfied with his long journey through the world of mortals, Akash returns to the dangerous Ristula court, where during the absence of her influence has dried up. But the queen in the world intends to conquer the top and the throne of the lower limits. Having made a deal with the exiled demon-prince, Akasha expanded her power, and her diabolical plans are finally beginning to be implemented.

title: The One True King
description: In times forgotten even by Ostarian himself, he quenched the passion for eternal life not with a ghostly essence, but a non-stop harvested bone. The scorched bones formed the walls of his palace; the streets were bridged with the bones of all known beings and enemies. And the creatures of the flesh were afraid to enter the possessions of the King, because he was first of all a collector, and nothing in the Kostya Empire eluded the eternal sight of his lifeless eyes.

title: Flockheart's Gamble
description: The lost, faded away from the pack, and also saddened by the unbearably stupid riot, guilty of all, the heat-lamather of the Heart was forced to trust the goddess of luck in order to survive the trials on the way of reunion with his relatives. After all, the goddess herself and put the Ogre-magician to look after this pack. But just... what oak did it fall from, considering it a good idea?

title: Planetfall
description: Being one with the spirit of this earth, it now carries its particle into other soils. Filled with echoes of memories of the broken firm, the La Personnel paid a great price, but has already defeated one interstellar guest who wanted to destroy the force inside it. She has awakened and seeks to revive the perished world, but it is haunted by many dark forces who want to finish what was started. And for the first time in his life, the Earth Converge rushed his gaze to the heavens to somehow come to terms with the destructive death that his sister-earth-earther... And at any cost to avenge her death.

title: The Magus Cypher
description: Many sorcerers believed that the Great Puzzle is only an interesting curiosity. And yet whole generations of wizards were killed in trying to understand her. Even when the greatest magician considered that he had revealed her secret, he had not known her true meaning for a long time: the knowledge hidden inside the Great Puzzle allowed him to change the very nature of magic. And now Rubick is not just virtuoso imitating someone else's art. By sweeping away all the limits of magical possibilities, he at his command changes the essence of magic and constantly seeks and unraveled new supernatural mysteries. Perhaps they will also reveal to him the unknown aspects of sorcery.

title: Feast of Abscession
description: Many centuries ago, the Rumusian Krellah shackled an indestructible hook on the chain that would stop the most powerful servants of the Dead God and discourage the destruction of her chosen ones. But the sea of the Dead God surpassed even the legendary spells of Krellah. The memorial servicemen, the chains left their mistress and began to crush her subjects, obeying the orders of the Dead God. Now, having long fulfilled their unclean purpose, the chains have sworn to serve as a new master ... and his intoxicating craft.

title: Benevolent Companion
description: In each of the universes there are echoes of this eternal being, which existed between the worlds known and unknown to us even before the beginning of the times. Having spent eternity in the most remote corners of mysterious limits, Io knows: wherever you are led by a storm of battle, the connection of friendship will help to survive anything.

title: Bladeform Legacy
description: The Junero mask split in two, aroising the ancient souls resting in it. They became one with Junero, endowing him with wisdom and fury of their ancestors. Such a symbiosis turned the hero we know into something new and frightening ... The natural disaster that has descended to simple mortals.

title: Great Sage's Reckoning
description: May Sun Wukun’s sins have long been forgiven, his exctling achievements are alive in our memory to this day. Survive three legendary feats from the past similarities of the hero.

title: Tempest Helm of the Thundergod
description: This helmet, forged by the Hammer Celestar clan and filled with the energy of the ancients, as if infused sits on the head of the Lord of the heavens himself. The unbelievers will shudder when they hear thunder repentance over the battlefield!

title: Frost Avalanche
description: There are rumors that this dress was an ancient queen’s wedding dress. According to other information, it was a cloak of an ice fence. However, in reality, these enchanted tissues are variable like an avalanche, and can take any form. The latter form attracted a lone shaft, which became a hardy and faithful companion.

title: Manifold Paradox
description: By making a hoarse laughter, the older Blacksmith Crawler waved a sword that wrapped 11 generations of his family. He was so sharp that the world around him, with a crack of ruptured matter, dispersed. Through this rupture, Crawler saw himself a few moments earlier holding the same coveted sword. Suddenly, in an attack of greed and insane, he struck his doppelganger to get a second sword. But, late to Craireler felt a familiar wound, and suddenly the memories of her flooded at him.

title: Demon Eater
description: Shadow Fiend has long been collecting the souls of its enemies. Like any collector, he has extremely valuable trophies that everyone wants to show everyone. However, there are souls that should not be touched, full of darkness and fury so much that no living being is able to hold them. Having changed forever, Shadow Fiend knew the fee for collecting the souls of demons, but with it he knew all their power.

title: Swine of the Sunken Galley
description: After months of work, Techies bombers are proud to present their latest armament: The Swine, the world’s most powerful gun. During her first shot, she tore the galley on part, on which she stood, and flew ashore. A few days later, she was found deep in the rock right under the workshop of its creators.

title: Fractal Horns of Inner Abysm
description: Deep in hell inside hell, Terrorblade was imprisoned in the walls of his prison-measurement, sentenced to the eternity of perverted contemplation. He looked at the reflection of the worst of himself for a long time. In turn, I looked at him for a long time. But now they are fighting side by side – a single entity that is more powerful than ever before.

title: Blades of Voth Domush
description: Aging path of revenge against the abyss, Tresdin visited the blacksmith Kvit, about which there was an unkind rumor. He gave her these hellish blades. But too late may come the realization of the fact that the price for the use of such force will be much more than that of which it is ready to part with.

title: Fiery Soul of the Slayer
description: Many people know that Lina’s hair is blessed with fire, but only a few know why. When Lina was still very young, it was the smoking and smouldering hair that was the first sign that it had tremendous power. It took years of hard training so that the sorceress could control such manifestations of her talent. But, nevertheless, this power can not be concealed forever, and in the most intense moments of the battle, Lina’s hair flares up, showing absolute concentration and the highest degree of possession of flames, which can incinerate everything in its path.
